storyInfo: Rose Salt thought this mission was the chance to live the life of her dreams. Turns out she is getting more than she bargained for.

attributes.content: Thank you so much, hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: I still can't believe my lovely daughter would leave her old father like this. She won't even read my letters!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: It's almost the day of the rainmaking ritual. I can't thank you enough for being willing to play the part of my daughter and help us complete it!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: Don't mention it! I'm sure your daughter only left on a whim, and she'll come running back to her loving, wealthy father before you know it.
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Incidentally, I'm not here for the reward or anythingâ€”I just couldn't bear to see such a kind father wasting away from sorrow.
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Oh, you sweet, sweet girl!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: I really hope you've had a good time staying at my palace these days. I must thank you again. Here, take the promised reward! And there will be more once the ritual is complete!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: Oh, you're too kind! How could anyone hurt the feelings of a kind father like you?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Look at this bag of cash! Now that's what I'm talking about! And he's paying this much up front?! And I get to live in a palace?! I've hit the jackpot!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Please come with me, kind hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Sure, thanks!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Please, kind hanimefendi, no need to thank us! We are simply doing our duty.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: (Whisper) Why would the lord ameer's daughter run from such a lavish life in the palace, surrounded by jewels and servants?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Whisper) What kind of crazy person doesn't want the good life?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Whisper) Well, whatever, more for me then!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: The soft and comfy palanquin takes a few turns and stops in front of a luxurious mansion.
The servants carry Rose Salt down from her seat, and the lord ameer gives the orders for the gates to be opened.
Wow...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Fire burns in the fireplace of the grand hall, the flames flickering to the breeze of the servants' movements.
We can hold a ball here whenever you want.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: A ball...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Gentle music fills the room. Rose Salt takes off her shoes before stepping on the carpet with her bare feet, taking in its softness.
Such good manners... So adorable... Just like our dear princess.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: The lord ameer was crying just now when he told us to treat you as his own daughter.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: We prepared all sorts of clothing because we didn't know what you liked, hanimefendi.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Every season, the lord ameer commands us to procure new clothes. Linen, satin, silk, cotton... dresses, pants, robes, anything you want, we have it.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Perhaps this gem-set frock, this pearly silk skirt, or this long plumed dress? If you prefer something other than dresses, we also have many other selectionsâ€”
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Oh, there's no need to choose, I like all of them!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Choose? Why would I choose when it can all be mine?!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Really? Oh, thank goodness... I can't believe you like everything I prepared!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: We have also prepared a simple dinner for you. I apologize for how humble it is, as we were not expecting you to arrive today.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Rose Salt has to gulp, lest her saliva overflow from her mouth at the myriad elaborate dishes laid out on the table.
Oh my god, that's soooo kind of you. I'm really not a picky eater, you know. There isn't a single thing here that I don't like!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Steak! Stew! Fruits! Fins! All mine!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Night has fallen, and Rose Salt lies on a huge, soft feather bed, wearing a jewel-lined silk nightgown.
The white moonlight shines through the curtains, falling like water upon the marble floor.
A good life... a life of luxury... it's mine at last!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: I'll never leave, no matter what!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: NEVER!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: A few days have passed. Rose Salt is enjoying everything that the lord ameer's palace has to offer.
Mm...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: *Yawn* That was a great night's sleep!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Mm... I wonder what I should eat today...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Good morning, hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Would you like to have breakfast now? I've seen that you have a liking for meat, and have prepared it according to your tastes. Let me help you get washed, and then we will serve your meal.
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Y-You guys were here all along?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Of course, hanimefendi! In order to help you adjust to life here, we have been monitoring your every move twenty-four hours a day. We are absolutely confident that we can provide the best possible care!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Twenty-four hours a day?!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Of course! We are ever so grateful that you have agreed to help us with the ritual. It is hard to find people as kind-hearted as you! We'll make sure that your time here is as comfortable as it can possibly be.
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: I... I want to get up...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Please, don't move! I'll do it!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: The servant stops Rose Salt from getting up, places a pillow under her, wipes her face clean with a cloth dipped in rose essence, and changes her clothes into a casual house dress.
We can't possibly make our princess get up on her own!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Oh princess, you're so beautiful... According to our observations, you always wish to have breakfast as soon as you get up. Bring the table!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Huh? Wait...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Wow, this does look good...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Please, don't move! I'll do it!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Another servant stops Rose Salt from moving her hand, before cutting a piece of steak and bringing it to her mouth.
We can't possibly make our princess cut her own meat! Here, open your mouth, hanimefendi, ahhhhâ€”
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Ahhhhâ€”
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: What is it, hanimefendi? Is it not to your taste?
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: (How old do they think I am, three? I don't need to be hand-fed!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Oh, no, not at all, I love it!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: But you hesitated! There must be a reason. Did I fail to adequately predict your tastes? Were you not satisfied with the steak's quality? Or was the seasoning not to your taste?
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: (Does nobody here think it's weird to be hand-feeding me?)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Of course not! I'm super satisfied with the food. It's just... I want to eat on my own!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: B-But think of the toll on your delicate fingers! Ah, I know, I will wrap your utensils in silk ribbons, so that they will not harm your fine skin!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Here, I've wrapped them for you... are they too heavy? Do your wrists hurt? What about your fingers? Maybe I should feed you after all...
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: No, not at all, there's no need, no problem at all...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Finshit! Just leave me alone!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: You must not exert yourself nor carry anything heavy! All you need to do is enjoy everything in perfect comfort!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: It already pains me so much to see you eating by your own hands!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: (Help!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Oh, not at all!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Being able to help you all is already more than enough for me. I wouldn't want to be a burden to such kind people!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: But please, let me eat on my own... That's what I'm used to...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: I-I see... as you wish...
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: ...(Chews with a forced smile)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Please, stop giving me that doting look! I'm getting indigestion!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Alright, I'm done!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Hanimefendi! How are your hands?
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Were the dishes to your liking?
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Absolutely! Thank you so much!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Now that I've eaten, I'd like to go for a walk, take a look around.
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: You would like to go out? Of course! Where to? The garden is beautiful, and we have all sorts of adorable pets to keep you company. Allow me toâ€”
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: No, no, I know, you're here to make me happy, right?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Of course, hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Then do you know what would make me happiest?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Let me explore the garden by myself! I'd be happiest if you're not on my tail!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Wh-What do you...
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Like I said! I would be so very, very pleased if you didn't do that! So, please, absolutely do not follow me!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Finally, I can breathe! What is WRONG with those people? At least I've lost them, finally.
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: So, I get to enjoy this entire garden all to myself? Is this how the wealthy live?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Ah... This rocking chair feels so good. They even have a pavilion with ice to keep you cool, and delicious fresh fruit... but... but...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Why do I feel like I'm being watched?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Don't see anyone... Must be my imagination.
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Whisper) Success! She didn't see me.
attributes.name: Servant in Bushes

attributes.content: Excellent. Report if the hanimefendi wants anything! And don't you dare let her spot you!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: (Whisper) Roger!
attributes.name: Servant in Bushes

attributes.content: Forget it. This is the perfect place for a nap...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Zzz... mm... Oh, the flowers are starting to making my nose itch... ah-choo!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Whisper) The hanimefendi just sneezed! Repeat, the hanimefendi just sneezed!
attributes.name: Servant in Bushes

attributes.content: Roger! I'll send a handkerchief this instant!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Squad Two & Three, cut the flowers around her. Do not disturb her or be seen!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Achoo!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Did I just hear something...? A bee, maybe?
attributes.name: Rose Salt
Rose Salt
attributes.content: This place is like heaven. There are butterflies, bees, fowlbeasts, and white clouds in the blue skies...

attributes.name: Rose Salt
attributes.content: And a drone...

attributes.name: Rose Salt
attributes.content: A drone?
attributes.joined: This place is like heaven. There are butterflies, bees, fowlbeasts, and white clouds in the blue skies...  And a drone...  A drone?

attributes.content: A drone... carrying a handkerchief?!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Before Rose Salt can figure out why there is a drone, she hears the sound of scissors snipping.
A hand reaches out of the bushes to catch a rose before it hits the ground, then promptly disappears into the foliage.
Wh-What's that sound?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Snip! Snip! Snip!
Rose Salt looks around, but sees nothing. Somehow, the flowers keep disappearing one after another, even though there is no one else around.
(How could someone be that fast?! I've been picking pockets for who knows how long, but I can't even catch a glimpse!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Not in this shrub, or this one! Who is it? What are they doing?)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Snip!
The last flower disappears from plain sight. Yet as far as she can tell, she is the only one in the garden.
Rose Salt can't help but clench the handkerchief tight in her hand, and realizes that there is a slip of paper inside.
'I am not your servant, hanimefendi! Nor am I by your side! Please, cover your nose with this handkerchief to keep the pollen out!'
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: ...AHHHH!!!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: HELPâ€”!!!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Whisper) Phew... mission accomplished! The hanimefendi didn't see any of us!
attributes.name: Servant in Bushes

attributes.content: (Whisper) Hey, what's going on? She just ran away screaming!
attributes.name: Servant in Bushes

attributes.content: Oh no! We must not be doing a good enough job!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Â¡Dios mÃ­o! What the finshit is going on? Have they been watching me from the shadows all this time?!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: They're loco! Should I just run away?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: But the lord ameer is paying so much. So, so much. Not to mention the completion bonus, and all the luxury... I-I don't want to leave!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Damn it, damn it!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Oh, there you are, hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: No! Leave me the hell alone!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Er, what I meant to say is... I've realized that you've been following me in secret, and I'm NOT happy about it!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: I'm going to take a bath now! Do NOT follow me this time!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: How could this be...? Was it not enough? She is unhappy because we haven't shown her enough love!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Quick, we must do something... To make the hanimefendi truly enjoy her life here and feel our gratitude!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: I'm really alone now? There's no one watching me?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Finshit. How long do I have to hide in here? Have they really left?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Damn it. I shouldn't let the private bath of the lord ameer's daughter go to waste! Fragrance oils, flower petals... if I'm here, I may as well enjoy it!
attributes.name: Rose Salt
Rose Salt
attributes.content: Fill up the tub... put in some oils and petals...

attributes.name: Rose Salt
attributes.content: Huh?

attributes.name: Rose Salt
attributes.content: Why is there a big hole on the floor of the bathroom?
attributes.joined: Fill up the tub... put in some oils and petals...  Huh?  Why is there a big hole on the floor of the bathroom?

attributes.content: A tunnel? Right in the middle of the princess's bathroom? And it wasn't sealed up?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Is there something down there?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: The tunnel is so long... it's even got lighting... What's going on here?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Something's written on the wall. 'They love me so much. I can't take it anymore!' 'I don't want people watching my every move!' 'I have no freedom! I want to run away! I've had enough of this life!'
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Were these left behind by the real daughter? I was wondering why she ran away from home... And now I know! I can't take it anymore either!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Hey, this tunnel leads outside!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Does this mean I can get out? Couldn't I just pretend to take bath all day and do what I want outside before coming back at night? That way, I could enjoy the good life and still get some me time!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Yeah... it's the perfect plan! This way!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: I'm almost at the exit! I'm getting outta here!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Just a little bit further... a little further, and I'll be free at last!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Oh my...
Whoa! Who's there?!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: It seems like we've made a good decision about keeping this tunnel the princess dug herself. You really are just like her, right down to how you try to run away while taking a bath!
AHHH! HELPâ€”!!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Five days later
There you go, hanimefendi! Look how beautiful your skin has become now that you haven't had to lift a finger these past few days! Now, my heart can truly be at ease.
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: We've bathed you, powdered you, perfumed you, and put you in this beautiful dress. Now you're ready for the ritual!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: All you need to do is to transfer water from the golden bowl to the golden basin using a willow branch. The more water you flick in, the more successful the ritual!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Finally! The finshit things I do for money! Let's get this over with and I'm outta here!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: You look so beautiful today, hanimefendi! Let's go to the ritual now!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Rose Salt lifts the hems of her long dress and walks on the feather-paved streets with shoes of silk.
The citizens gaze upon her with expectant eyes, hoping for the ritual to be a success.

As she struggles to breathe under five or six layers of clothing, the choking scent of the powders and perfumes, and the weight of the complex braids that took two hours to tie, she makes up her mind.
(Outside at last! It's now or never! I don't even care about that finshit completion bonus anymore!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Screw the ritual! I've got the money with me, so I'm making a run for it!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Hanimefendi! Hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Excited Citizen

attributes.content: The ritual will go great with you!
attributes.name: Happy Citizen

attributes.content: (I'll smash the bowl, stir up the feathers as a distraction, and throw the dizzyleaf bundles on the torches... it's the perfect plan!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Don't worry, hanimefendi, I'll carry you on my back if you're tired!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: Is the golden bowl too heavy for you? I can carry it until we arrive.
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: Oh, sweet, sweet girl!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: (Arrgghh! I don't wanna see these people ever again!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: (Now!)
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Rose Salt finds an opportunity and pulls her elaborate dress off!
In her mind, she had pictured herself escaping with the same agility she is accustomed to, disappearing in the blink of an eye before anyone realizes what happened.

In reality, she trips over her silk shoes and the feathers on the ground. As feathers fly, the golden bowl and dizzyleaf bundles fly uncontrollably in every direction, while she herself falls flat on the ground.
...Oh no.
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: To her surprise, she hears nothing but cheers around her.
Hanimefendi! It's a miracle! A miracle!
attributes.name: Excited Citizen

attributes.content: The golden bowl fell right into the basin! Not a single drop was spilled! It's a divine miracle! All hail the hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Happy Citizen

attributes.content: All hail the hanimefendi!
attributes.name: Excited Citizen

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: My sweet girl! I can't believe it...
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: Not only did you agree to help me, you performed the ritual so spectacularly! Please, accept these bags of gems as a token of my gratitude!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: Oh, hanimefendi! The ritual has never been so successful! This is fantastic!
attributes.name: Doting Servant

attributes.content: My eyes are filled with tears! Please, take my hand and I'll help you up! The palanquin is already here. We'll take you home and make dinner for you!
attributes.name: Kindly Servant

attributes.content: ...No! NO!!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Rose Salt grabs the gems from the lord ameer and runs away screaming, not slowing down until she is at least a few hundred meters away.
Oh, my girl, why do you run away?
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: The ritual was a great success! Come back next year! I'd love to have you back!
attributes.name: Lord Ameer

attributes.content: ABSOLUTELY NOT!
attributes.name: Rose Salt

attributes.content: Two weeks later
I heard there are a few new stories in the latest edition of Sargonian Fables. The best is 'The Lord Ameer and His Daughters.'
attributes.name: Operator A

attributes.content: It's about how both daughters of a lord ameer ran away from home, preferring the hard life outside.
attributes.name: Operator A

attributes.content: Crazy, isn't it? Why would anyone just throw away a good life like that?
attributes.name: Operator A

attributes.content: Absolutely. All those gems, gardens, clothes, the food... Who would run away from their own happiness?
attributes.name: Operator B

attributes.content: It just doesn't make sense, right, Rose Salt?
attributes.name: Operator B

attributes.content: Uh, yeah... whatever you say...
attributes.name: Rose Salt
